jm.audio.io

Class AudioFileIn

  • java.lang.Object
    • jm.audio.io.AudioFileIn

  • public class AudioFileIn
extends java.lang.Object
    Audio file reading class for jMusic. The class utilises the JavaSound file reading classes. It works indepdently of the jMusic audio architecture used for rendering scores, and is intended for use by simple file manipulation utility programs operating asychronously (non real time). This class deals with some the current (at time of writing) incompletness in the javaSound package, including converting bytes from a file into floats for both big and little endian formats, and support for 24 bit files.

        public float[] getSampleData()
        Provides a single array with the raw sample data in the format of the source file. Check the number of channels and file type if required.
        Returns:
        sampleData the audio data as an array of floating point values.

      • getChannels
